name: Slimeow
description:
A short arcade about a slimy cat fighting its way through wonky monsters.
Move with WASD. Use LMB to shoot slime and than eat the enemies who you managed to hit.

See how long you can survive and post your high score!

Programming — bigslav, budnichniy, SouJll
Art — Alexandra Fedyushko (alexgeshtar@gmail.com)
Game Design — keichi4
Audio — Maxim Panchenko (mfire.panchenko@gmail.com)

Made for Mini Jam 127 in two days!
